item.title: HTB CTFs
item.description: Disclaimer There are CTFs here that I have done and have written on a repo I have on GITHUB, however future CTFs are going to be posted here. There will headers for ones that are marked to go to my github repo 247 CTFs From GITHUB Compare-The-Pair Secured-Session Trusted-Client HTB CTFS From GITHUB Web Challenges ApacheBlaze Insomnia PDFy ProxyAsAService RenderQuest jscalc Boxes BoardLight Mailing PermX

item.title: HTB Pentesting Checklist/Playbook
item.description: Enumeration NOTE: These steps are more general Ofc. Playbook gets more detailed later Run nmap scan with following command: nmap -p- -sVC -vv <IP Addr> -oA enum/nmap Search on google for each port that is found on hacktricks for pentesting them Look for unusual ports that are not usually opened NOTE: Focus on ports other than port 80/443 first as 80/443 will take a longer time to enumerate Overall for the ports I like to use https://book.
